problem_text:
Let A and N_c denote the varieties of abelian groups and nilpotent groups of class ⩽ c, respectively. Let F_r = Fr(AN_c) be a free group of rank r in AN_c. An element of F_r is called primitive if it can be included in a basis of F_r. Does there exist an algorithm recognizing primitive elements in F_r?
E. I. Timoshenko
